message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can shake on it!
Meet me halfway, let's end this!
You're getting closer to the middle, but I'm not there yet. Give me a bit more!
You're getting greedy, I'm getting firm!
Let's find a sweet spot. You're getting closer to my target, but I still want a bit more.
I'm not backing down, meet me in the middle!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still want a slight edge. Can we meet in the middle, but with a slight bias towards me?
I'm not giving you the edge, it's time to meet me!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still want to keep the upper hand. Can we make a deal?
You're getting desperate, I'm getting firm!
I'm making a final push. This is my best offer, take it or leave it!
This is my final offer, take it or we both walk away with nothing!
